body_html: Does anyone make sure that the 7.3x & 58x performance data claimed on TF Dev Summit are based on AWS with K80? Google has servers with 8GPUs connected by PCIE, so for the 8 GPU get 7.3x performance improving, it is one node with 8 GPUs, or 8 GPUs with multiple nodes? And what batchsize do they use?
